ygData.subject: Just a Reminder
ygData.msgSnippet: Well met fellow bards, seeing as how our numbers have grown to over 200 I felt it was time for a refresher. Please tell all of your bardic companions about the
ygData.messageBody:
Well met fellow bards, seeing as how our numbers have grown to over 200
I felt it was time for a refresher.


Please tell all of your bardic companions about the list; send them to...
http://www.onelist.com/subscribe/eqbards

For back issues of our newsletter, Legends of Lore: A Bards Tale in Norrath, go to...
http://www.rpgdungeon.com/library/news.html



Snowlynx has set up an IRC chat for use at...
Channel: EverQuestBards
Server: irc.starchat.net
Port: 6668


And because of surprising response to the survey we sent out, I have set up an IRC chat
and have decided on an every other Friday schedule at 10PM EST. Please come and talk
with your fellow bards. BTW I set up the room using Microsoft Chat.
Room: EQBARDS
Server: comicsrv.microsoft.com
Time: May 14th at 10PM EST

May the Song of Service play long and loud,
Torenithus Legendmaker
Bard of Qeynos
